metadata.title: CVE-2019-2201 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In generate_jsimd_ycc_rgb_convert_neon of jsimd_arm64_neon.S, there is apossible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could leadto remote code execution in an unprivileged process with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9Android-10Android ID: A-120551338

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.3
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.3
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.3
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.3').
